特記事項:
この科目は、10/10（月）までの授業がオンデマンドで実施される科目です。
10/11（火）以降の授業は対面での実施が決定しました。本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course will be offered on-demand until 10/10（Mon.）.
Classes will be held in a face-to-face format from Monday, 10/11（Tue.） onward.
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法:
IMPORTANT NOTICE: This course is conducted in lecture format. Please note the following in light of the ongoing pandemic: assignments will be posted on LUNA throughout the term, along with important announcements about the course -- including which lectures are in person and which are online -- and so it is critical that students log in to LUNA regularly during this course.

This course will be offered on-demand until Monday (Holiday), October 10. After the course registration is finalized, students will be notified of the course implementation format from Tuesday, October 11 onward.

評価.教科書Required texts0: All reading assignments will be based on texts available at the SIS library.
評価.参考文献・資料Reference books0:
Note: Full bibliographical information for the following reading materials will be included in the full-length syllabus given to students on the first day of class.

Mary Beard, “SPQR: A History of Rome”
Holger H. Herwig, “The Marne, 1914: The Opening of World War I and the Battle that Changed the World”
Buddy Levy, “Conquistador: Hernan Cortes, King Montezuma, and the Last Stand of the Aztecs”
Rebecca Berens Matzke, “Deterrence through Strength: British Naval Power and Foreign Policy under Pax Britannica”
Munro Price, “Napoleon: The End of Glory”
Victor Rothwell, “The Origins of the Second World War”
Peter H. Wilson, “Europe’s Tragedy: A New History of the Thirty Years War”
評価.学位授与の方針との関連Relationship to Diploma Polic:
各授業科目は、各学部・研究科の定めるディプロマ・ポリシー（DP）・カリキュラム・ポリシー（CP）に基づき、カリキュラム上に配置されています。
DP・CPを意識して本授業科目の学修を進めることで、各学部・研究科の期待する能力が養成されます。
各学部・研究科のDP、CPや教育課程表（授業科目一覧等）は、下記リンクこちらに掲載していますので学修計画の参考にしてください。
https://kwic.kwansei.ac.jp/cabinet/reference?typeCd=0&cabinetId=557&directLink=1
※kwicへのリンクとなります（在学生のみ閲覧可）
